full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice of Proposed Procurement

### Engineering Graduate, Senior

The Department of National Defence (DND) requests proposals for the provision of engineering services by one (1) Engineering Graduate, Senior, to support the Central Data Management (CDM) support to the CH147F Weapon System Manager.

### Bid Details

* File Number: W8485-TSPS2022-12
* Location: National Capital Region, specific site: 455 Boulevard de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC
* Closing Date: September 06, 2022, 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* Term: One (1) year, plus one (1) one-year irrevocable option, with a possible extension of up to two (2) years
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Method of Supply: Competitive - Open bidding
* Pre-Qualified Suppliers: 43 companies listed below

### Services Required

* Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS) for the CH147F Weapon System Manager
* Support to the Central Data Management (CDM) for the CH147F Weapon System Manager

### Security Requirements

* Security Level required: Secret (ASI)
* Security Clearance required: FSC - Secret
* Document Safeguarding: None

### Important Details

* This bid solicitation is only open to pre-qualified suppliers.
* Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be emailed directly to qualified suppliers.
* Bidders are advised that RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (getit.gc.ca).
* Enquiries regarding this RFP must be submitted to the DND Point of Contact listed below.

### Contact Information

* Name: Chantal Leavoy
* Email: chantal.leavoy@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: None
* Fax: None
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Pre-Qualified Suppliers

The following companies have been pre-qualified for this RFP:

1. 9468269 Canada Corp.
2. Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
3. ACF Associates Inc.
4. ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
5. Adirondack Information Management Inc., The AIM Group Inc. in Joint Venture
6. AECOM Canada Ltd.
7. ...
43. WSP Canada Inc.

Note: The complete list of pre-qualified suppliers is available in
